scripts.1-irys-ar-uploads:devnet: CLUSTER=devnet solana config set --url https://api.devnet.solana.com && solana config set --keypair ~/NFT-projects/Solana/nftsatire/wallets/devnet-id.json && esrun scripts/1-irys-uploads.ts
scripts.1-irys-ar-uploads:mainnet: CLUSTER=mainnet solana config set --url https://api.mainnet-beta.solana.com && solana config set --keypair ~/NFT-projects/Solana/nftsatire/wallets/mainnet-id.json && esrun scripts/1-irys-uploads.ts
